items.sentence: What does Tom consider to be the most important point?
I can\'t believe Tom ate the whole chicken by himself.
I can\'t remember Tom ever taking a day off from work.
It isn\'t good for your health to stay inside all day.
Tom wishes he didn\'t have to help with the housework.
It\'ll probably take you about three hours to do that.
It\'s likely to take you about three hours to do that.
We talked in low voices so we wouldn\'t wake the baby.
We tied him up so that he wouldn\'t be able to escape.
I should\'ve reported it to the police, but I didn\'t.
Be sure to turn off the light when you leave the room.
Can you remember the first time you heard the Beatles?
Can you still work as many hours a day as you used to?
Do I have to fill out this application form in French?
I don\'t feel like doing anything when it\'s this hot.
We\'ve already spent over three hours discussing this.
What makes you think Tom wouldn\'t be able to do that?
If you aren\'t careful, you\'re going to be suspended.
I shouldn\'t have to tell you to keep your room clean.
I shouldn\'t have walked home late at night by myself.
